import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'mail', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'traning'; public cities =[{ name: 'hochiminh',temp: -30 },{ name: 'hanoi', temp: 19 },{ name:'haiphong',temp: -4 }]; ; }
